channel.title: Organ Transplantation in India on Organ Transplantation
channel.description: Recent content in Organ Transplantation in India on Organ Transplantation

item.title: How to Contribute
item.description:
This is a side project with no funding or staff. Contributions are welcome but I can’t promise quick responses or that everything will be used.

What Would Be Helpful

Better data sources If you know of reliable organ transplantation datasets I’ve missed, especially from hospitals or state governments.

Corrections Point out factual errors, broken links, or outdated information.

Missing resources Key papers, reports, or websites that should be included.

Ground-level insights How transplantation laws actually work in practice. What doctors worry about legally. Barriers patients face.

item.title: Datasets
item.description: [Insert information about GOTD datasets as well as interactive charts]
Collected legal provisions and sources for updated versions
Vidhi working papers as well as other reports on this subject.
